Charles Osa Igbinovia (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 20 Nọvemba 1971), nke a maara dịka Charles Novia, bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-akọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye edemede. A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Benin City, isi obodo Edo Steeti, a maara Novia maka ihe nkiri dịka Missing Angel (2004), Caught in The Middle na Alan Poza (2013). N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu Naịjirịa iji gosipụta ihe nkiri Nollywood maka ụdị asụsụ mba ọzọ kachasị mma nke Academy Awards site na Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
